description: Try our easy to follow Irish Apple Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Irish Apple Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whip cream until thick. Fold in sultana liquid. Slice pie and serve with cream.
